featured.text: Finding out which college suits you involves time and energy, but ___(25)___ more than those you might spend on buying a motorcycle or a computer.
Jack is very proud of his fancy new motorcycle.

definition.zh_def: 一種兩輪的機動車輛，通常由引擎驅動，供人騎乘。
definition.en_def: A two-wheeled motor vehicle powered by an engine, designed for riding.
definition.example: He rides his motorcycle to work every day.
